main event: A local man in Redlands, California reported seeing a lighted object in the sky with 6-10 red and orange lights on February 4, 1968.
interesting points: The object produced a sound similar to the sound used on the TV show 'The Invaders', causing nearby dogs to bark.
The witness reported a tingling sensation that caused the hair on his body to stand on end, suggesting the presence of an electromagnetic force.
The university investigators did not rule out the possibility of a helicopter being the cause of the sighting.
A search and rescue team and a light plane were also in the area around the time of the sighting, which may have contributed to the reported sighting and sound.
The local newspaper reported on the incident, including details about a possible connection to a nearby car accident and rescue operation.
sighted object: lighted object with 6-10 red and orange lights
